sys_remote_update_set.description: 1. The closed dates are being copied from the template rather than the work end date. 2. On Copy change, the old change is set as the model on new one even though is it not marked as a template. The system should only select the previous template. 3. On Copy change, the old Service offering is selected even if it is decommissioned / non-operational. Only operational service offering should be selected.
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Fix the Preapproved change Closed Date issue
